resources.string: Point the camera view to a QR Code to read the information

"Download Traffic Pune App and make commuting safe and simple in the following ways:
Find out which roads are blocked for road repairs, processions or other public events. Find out what alternative routes are planned.
Not sure what the traffic rules are, or how much fine you should pay for a particular offence? Traffic Pune App provides the right answer.
Pune Traffic Police is committed to the use of latest technology in the service of its citizens.
For any proposed changes in the traffic plan in your locality, send in your opinions and suggestions online.
Propose fresh changes and ideas and contribute to traffic safety in your locality.
View contact numbers for senior traffic officials in case of emergency.
Report accidents, traffic problems and emergencies in your locality and receive quick police assistance.
During rains and in other special conditions, find out where the traffic bottlenecks are.
Traffic Pune App provides a bridge between traffic police and citizens for instant, proactive and interactive communication.
Jai Hind !
Pune Traffic Police"
(Click on FAB to check Single permission.\nTo test again, change the app permission in settings or reinstall the app)
